resources.string: Search for musicians all around the world who have the same interests as you. Customize the search using tags, music genre and much more to find the perfect match for you
Once you have found your JAMZ buddy/ies, you are ready to organize your jam, gig or band audition and start feeling the new experience.
Under this single but powerful rule, you can enjoy your musical journey with new people and therefore find new ideas to enrich your music life.
